sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_theme_be6628fddb386f00e243b6d1ba9619e8
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_theme"><sys_ui_theme action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><css>/* Header Colors */
/* Search text color */ 
$search-text-color: #eee
/* Topbar background color*/
$navpage-header-bg: #385052
/* Topbar text color */
$navpage-header-color: #fff
/* Bottom border color on topbar */ 
$navpage-header-divider-color: #82B5A1

/* Left nav and navigation toolbar background color */
/* Navigator hover color */
$nav-highlight-main: #68a1af
/* Background for expanded navigation items */
$subnav-background-color: #253e40
/* Backgorund for navigator (left side only). */
$navpage-nav-bg: #253e40
/* Background for Favorites list, history list, and Connect list background. */
$navpage-nav-bg-sub: #385052
/* Text color in main navigation */
$navpage-nav-color-sub: #eee
/* Text color when hovering over items in main nav */
$navpage-nav-mod-text-hover: #eee
/* Divider color in Navigator */
$nav-hr-color: #253e40

/* Navigator tabs */
/* Active nav item underneath search */
$nav-highlight-bar-active: #8686bc
/* Inactive nav items underneath search */
$nav-highlight-bar-inactive: #4b4b7f
/* Background for currently selected navigation item underneath search */
$navpage-nav-selected-bg: #385052
/* Color of icon for currently active nav item. */
$navpage-nav-selected-color: #b1b1e4
/* Color of icons for non inactive nav items.*/
$navpage-nav-unselected-color: #8686bc

/* Navigator Application text */
/* Color for latest connect messages in right bar. */
$connect-latest-message: #E54038
/* Timestamp header backgrounds in History tab*/
$nav-timeago-header-color: #303a46
/* Core content text color */
$navpage-nav-app-text: #eee
/* Core content text color hover*/
$navpage-nav-app-text-hover: #eee

/* Color of outline for search */
$navpage-nav-border: #8686bc
/* Default button/icon colors */
$navpage-button-color:  #fff
/* Hover color for ^^^ */
$navpage-button-color-hover: #8686bc</css><device>concourse</device><name>NewNOW</name><sys_class_name>sys_ui_theme</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-27 14:40:41</sys_created_on><sys_id>be6628fddb386f00e243b6d1ba9619e8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>NewNOW</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_theme_be6628fddb386f00e243b6d1ba9619e8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-27 14:40:41</sys_updated_on></sys_ui_theme></record_update>
